oneOf.description: Deposits a given amount into the vault.
Withdraws a given amount from the vault.
Flash-loans a given amount from the vault.
Updates the configuration of the contract. If a field is not specified, it will not be modified.

deposit_enabled.description: If users should be able to deposit funds to the contract.

flash_loan_enabled.description: If users should be allowed to perform flash-loans.

new_owner.description: The new owner of the contract.

withdraw_enabled.description: if users should be able to withdraw funds from the contract.

Binary.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>

CallbackMsg.description: The callback messages available. Only callable by the vault contract itself.
